Vega.jl

A Julia package for generating visualizations in Vega

Getting Started
Visualization Primitives
Creating A Visualization From Scratch

Pre-defined Visualizations

Area Plot
Bar Plot
Choropleth
Heatmap
Histogram

Pie/Donut Chart
Population Chart
Scatter Plot
Waterfall
Wordcloud

Visualization Modifying Functions

xlab! / ylab!
xlim! / ylim!
title!
legend! (Add Title)
showlegend! / hidelegend!
colorscheme!
coord_flip!

View the Project on GitHubjohnmyleswhite/Vega.jl

Pie/Donut Chart

Function Keywords:

x::AbstractArray
y::AbstractArray
holesize::Int = 175

Pie Chart

using Vega

fruit = ["peaches", "plums", "blueberries", "strawberries", "bananas"]
bushels = [100, 32, 180, 46, 21]

piechart(x = fruit, y = bushels)

Donut Chart

using Vega

fruit = ["peaches", "plums", "blueberries", "strawberries", "bananas"]
bushels = [100, 32, 180, 46, 21]

piechart(x = fruit, y = bushels, holesize = 175)
